string.value: You don't appear to be in any games right now.
{0} has started a game in Azeroth! use /join to get in on the fun and raid all the Lycans!
A new game has been started by {0}! Use /join to get eaten!
{0} has started a chaos game in Azeroth! use /join to get in on the fun and raid all the Lycans!
A new chaos game has been started by {0}! Use /join to get eaten!
You can't join now! The game is already running.
You've already joined!
1 minute left to /join
{0} seconds left to /join
Not enough players, Zeus cancelling game!
Where are the other heroes? Zeus won't start the game!
Randoming heroes! Please wait while Zeus assign heroes.
{0} is banned for attempting an exploit (no names starting with /)
{0} please change your name to join, Zeus doesn't like your name.
Hey Noob! max players limit has been reached. Please find another match.
{0} has joined the match. {1} heroes, {2} min, {3} max
{0} Please click the start button below or {1} and start me, Zeus couldn't PM you your role. If you do not start the bot, you may not joined in this match.
You can't run away! YOU'RE DEAD! Get back back in the ground.... jeez
{0} ran away from Azeroth! Noob detected
{0} players remain.
Hey! Zeus didn't ask you anything yet!
You don't seem to be playing...
Zeus can't find a player by that name!
This answer is not valid!
{0} has voted to eat {1}
{0} has voted to exile {1}
{0} has not voted 2 nights in a row. Zeus mad, he strikes {0} with his powerful thunder and, {0} suddenly falls, dead. {1}
As the Fallen Knight, you are now the Lycan .. (Such an Impossible thing, isn't it?)
Accepeted!
\nThe Dark Seer is {0}
You found {0}'s Wall of Replica has been damaged. As the choosen Illusion you try to build the new Wall of Replica, and now you step up to become the Dark Seer.
Something strange happened to {1}'s Wall of Replica, {0} just built the new Wall of Replica and stepped up as the new Dark Seer. Keep it secret, Silencer.
You see {0} is {1}!
{0}'s Illusion came to you, and reveal that they are {1} !
Who do you want to exile from Azeroth, heroes?
Choose the hero you want to follow, Rikimaru!
Choose the hero you want to shoot with your Assassinate, Sniper! {0} chance(s) remain.
Torment time! Please choose the hero, My Queen.
Choose the hero you want to follow with your Illusion, Dark Seer!
Purist Thunderwrath ready to protect the other heroes, choose someone to protect!
Who do you want to eat?
Who do you want to hunt?
Time to get your salaries from those Eidolons! Choose someone to hunt, Bounty Hunter!
Who is your role model?
Who do you want to convert to be another Eidolon?
Make sure you discuss with {0}
and

You are Wraith kingüòæ (Cursed). The cursed cruel King, in the past you killed your father because you really want to be the King. Before your former king died, he cursed you to be Lycan if Lycan bite you!
You are Rikimaruüïµ (Detective). During the day, you may choose a player to reveal their role by following them. However - in doing so, your role could be revealed to the Lycan! (40% chance)
Brewmasterüçª (Drunk) the Drunken Master. "It's okay if Lycan gonna eat me. But, they must drink with me before I died! Haha"
You are Omniknightüëº (Guardian Angel). Everynight you can call the Guardian Angel to protect a hero you choose. However, if you choose protecting Lycan, there is a 50% chance you will die.
You are Sniperüî´ (Gunner). During the day, you may Assassinate another player with your shot. Everyone will hear the shots, and know you are the Sniper.

Akashaüíã the Queen of Pain (Harlot). During the night, you may choose to rack another player. However - if you are trying to rack lycan, or visit someone who killed by Lycan, you will die. If you do go to visit though, and Lycan tries to visit you, you will survive.
Abaddonüñï the Fallen Knight! For now, you are a creep, but once all the Lycan die, you will become a Lycan. If the Dark Seer looks to you, you may or may not be identified as a Lycan.
XD YOU ARE LYCAN!!üê∫ (good on ya) Each night you can choose to eat someone.
You are Dark Seerüë≥. Each night, you may choose a player to be followed by one of your Illusion, and reveal their role to you.
You are a lowly creepüë±, doomed, spend your days to fight another creeps, and get eated. Your special ability is "do nothing".
You are Techiesüë∫. If you get banished, you will bomb the Azeroth and then you are the one who win!
You are a Wispüë∂! The weakest hero in Azeroth choose your 'role model' to protect you - if they die, you will become a Lycan.
You are SilencerüëÅ, you will be told who the (real) Dark Seer is - Remember your name, keep it silence.
You are an Illusionüôá. You are very different than other Illusions. You were decided to take Dark Seer's place if the (real) Dark Seer dies.
You are Enigmaüë§. Mother of Eidolon, every night you may choose a player to convert to be another Enigma. If all remaining living players at the end is Enigma, they win.
Bounty HunterüíÇ loves to collect bounty from Enigma. Your job is simple, get gold from all Enigma then be rich. If the enigma tries to convert you, the newest Enigma will die.

Dusk draws near, all the creeps gather in front of the Ancient to decide who they want to exile today ... Please choose wisely, some heroes are able to use their abilities when they got exiled. Zeus : You have {0} seconds to vote!
It's now day time. Zeus gave you {0} seconds to make your accusations / defenses / talk.
Night has fallen. All the heroes are sleeping, but night heroes are ready to show their abilities! Night heroes, you have {0} seconds to show your abilities!
The creeps have cast their votes, amid doubts and suspicions. {0} is exiled from Azeroth. {1}
Unable to come up with a proper decision on who to exile, the creeps returns to their base for the night, frustrated...
Something fishy, for no one voted! No ones leave Azeroth today.....
The creeps gather in the morning, but do not see {0}. Gem of true sight is dropped in front of his house, they found Rikimaru is bleeding. Rikimaruüïµ has been eaten by Lycan!.
Heroes and creeps gather in the morning but {0} isn't there. Bounty Hunter try to Track them, they found Rikimaru is bleeding.\n Rikimaru has been eaten by Lycan!
{0} was fainted, they lost their abilities. You have lost the Omniknightüëº
{0} was begging for help last night, but no one seems to care. In the morning, the heroes and creeps found {0}'s rifle are impaled on their heart. You have lost your Sniper.
The creeps awake in the morning, they found the {0}'s Wall of Replica has been destroyed, {0} is dead. the Dark Seerüë≥.
Everyone wakes to the smell of alcohol... Seems like, Brewmaster have a closing party last night. {0} the Brewmasterüçª has been eaten.
The sun rises in Azeroth, golems are standing in front of {0}'s house this morning. Someone try to check inside, and found the WarlocküÉè is dead.
As everyone rises in the morning, they smell a terrible stink. They follow the smell to find {0} shredded apart in the river, head missing. NOMNOMNOMNOM {1}
Azeroth feels more creepy than before, creep found {0}'s head in front of Roshan's place. NOMNOMNOMNOM {1}
Today, Bounty HunterüíÇ got their salary. {0} the Eidolon has been killed by the Bounty HunterüíÇ!
All the creeps gather the next morning in the front of Azeroth's ancient, to sighs of relief - it appears there was no attack the previous night.
You were bitten by the Lycans. As the cursed king, you have now become a Lycan!
Your lycan partner(s): {0}
Lycan(s) has voted to eat (0) last night. Since {0} was the Wraith King, they transformed to be Lycan! Grats on your new teammate.
Oh no! The lycan ate you! NOMNOMNOMNOM
Oh no! {0} was a Brewmaster! You couldn't resist the party last night, that was an amazing closing party from the Drunken Master, you must take a rest next day.
You tried to protect Lycan! The lycan has eaten you.
You have saved {0}'s life!
{0} was not attacked, so you didn't do much of anything.
You went to guard {0}, but they weren't home!
Omniknight sent the Guardian Angel to Repel you last night and fought your killer. Thanks to Omniknight!
Akasha decided to take the wrong night off, and stayed home. {0} has been eaten by the lycan!
Odd... {0} was not home! No torment today...
You came to {0}'s house for torment last night, but they are Lycan. You are dead.
{0} came to the wrong house last night! Akasha was wrecked by Lycan!
{0} come to {1}'s house, and ready to rack them. However, they instead find Lycan eating {1}! The Lycan quickly turns on {0} and jumps.... {0} is dead.
You see {0} is not Lycan, you racked them last night, HAHAHA.
Your eyes were closed, you couldn't see, but then someone slapped and torment you. Akasha, the Queen of Pain visited your house.
You caught {0} snooping about! They are Rikimaru!
Your snooping has shown you that {0} is {1}
Looks like {0} came back positive after a night with Akasha! The Sniper got revenge. {1} is dead.
Suddenly, a shot rings out. Azeroth turns to see {0} standing over {1}'s body, a rifle still aimed at the head. {2}
Lycan has won the game!
The Lycans have won the game!
The creeps have won! All the killers have died....
Oh no! You just exiled Techies! He bombed Azeroth and wins the game, silly.
Remaining living players, roles, and team:
{0} has voted to convert {1}
{0} was sent to do your dirty work, and convert {1}... however, they were Bounty Hunter! {0} is dead!
{0} came to your house last night, ready to convert you.... but you shoved your blade right through him. Enigma is dead... {1} remain!
The Enigma has converted you to their order! You are now an Enigma. Every other night, you will have a chance to convert another creep.
Enigmas: {0}
{0} has joined the eidolon and became Enigma!
{0} was sent to do your dirty work, and convert {1}... but no one was home!
All the Lycans have died, and the only people left standing have all been converted to eidolon and become Enigma.. The enigma has won!
You went to hunt {0}, but they are already dead!
You go into {0}'s house, and find them praying before an altar to some unknown god... You quickly slide your sword right through the evil cultist.
You go to {0}'s house, but there is no bounty there. They are not an enigma, so you return home.
{0}'s protector just died! In their rage, they have become a Lycan!
{0} has died! In your rage, you have become a Lycan! Your new teammates are: {1}
Creep üë±
Brewmaster üçª
Akasha üíã

üíÄ Dead
üôÇ Alive
Players Alive
Meepo üë∑
You are Meepo. If there are any other meepoes, you will know who they are. Otherwise, you are a creep.
As everyone rises, they find the body of {0} shoved into a pile of stone, blood splattered everywhere. Meepo has died!
The meepoes are: {0}
Your newest Enigma heads over to {0}'s house to convert them, but instead finds the house a complete wreck, blood everywhere, and bits of Lycan fur snagged on the doorway...
The pack heads to {0}'s house to eat them, but they are met by a tall dark figure, armed to the teeth. The Omniknight fights everyone off, and you head back defeated.
You send {0} to try to convert {1}, however their belief was too strong, and you were unable to convert them :(
@{1}, a player with the name {0} has already joined. Zeus said "change your name!".
You slipped into {0}'s house for torment... but as you are leaving, you happen to notice something strange, there are so much eidolon in the house....
was
Everyone wakes up in the morning, and notices that {0} is not around... They check the house to find the remains of {0}.
As the villagers gather as the sun rises, the find the remains of {0}, who died somehow last night...
Odd.... {0} didn't show up for the meepoes meeting this morning.... O.o
Fleeing while the game is running has been disabled by the group admin!
is dead
{0} added to admin list. Use /config to change group settings.
You are already in a game! ({0})
Your group has managed to start multiple games... Killing extras.
Your group is currently in the queue. Position: {0} / {1}
Sorry, I'm about to start a short maintenance break, you can't start a game right now.\nWaiting on {0} games to end...\nGo to @werewolfdev for more information
Sorry, max concurrent games has been reached ({0}). \nPosition in queue: {1} / {1}
{0} is a preferred group, and has skipped the queue!
There is no game running. Start a new game with /startgame or start a chaos game with /startchaos
Only a group admin can run this command.
After this game, I am shutting down for maintenance.
After this game, I am shutting down momentarily for an update (automated).
UserId was null. Are you sure you sent this as a reply?
{0} is already an admin!
{0} is not an admin!
{0} removed from admin list.
Language set to {0}
No seer!
Time's up!
You are Ogre Magiüèπ. You were destined to be conjoined twins. You can choose two players who will be cursed to be next the next Ogre Magi, if one of them dies the other one dies of sorrow.
You are Rubicküé≠. You have an ability to steal other player role. When that player dies, you will take on their role.

You are Sven üéØ. As rogue knight, you never sleep well, and you would never go to bed without your hammer. If you die, you can choose someone else to kill. If you are eaten, you have a chance to take a Lycan down, but will not be able to choose a player to kill.
You are Pudgeüî™ the Fatty Bastard. He came from the Fields of Endless Carnage, and never have enough fresh meat from the creeps. Everynight, he haunts and seek for fresh meat.
You have been cursed by Ogre Magi, {0} is your conjoined twins. If one of you dies, the other one will die out of sorrow.
Azeroth's creep has chosen to hang you! This is your last chance, use your stormhammer to someone as you go down!
{0} lost their blade, he cannot get it in time, and falls to their death with a loud snap of their neck...
{0} whips out their blade, looks at the crowd..... and cannot make a decision on who to shoot. They falls to their death, accepting their fate...
As the noose tightens around {0}'s neck, they show their blade, arm it, and threw the stormhammer to {1} as the floor drops out beneath them! {1} falls over, dead. {2}
You've been murdered! In your last moments, you have the chance to throw your stormhammer to someone.... make it quick!
The shot to {0} was too much, so much that they couldn't even reach for their blade, as they lay in a pool of blood.....
As {0} lays there, gasping for their final breathe, they can't decide who to kill.... and accept their fate..
As the stormhammer thrown, {0} fall to the ground.... but not without their blade, and throwing his stormhammer upon {1} falls over, dead. {2}
{0} sneaks over to {1}'s house, pops open the door, and is immediately greeted by a crazed bastard with a hook!!! {1} plunges the hook deep into {0}'s heart, cackling the entire time! {0} is dead D:
The lycans tried to attack Sven last night, but Sven was able to take one down with them as he died! {0} has died (Lycan)
Lycans tried to attack Sven last night, but Sven was able to take the wolf {0} down with their blade!
Lycans attempted to have a nice late night snack, but were instead greeted by a crazed fat bastard! {0} was killed in the fight!
It seemed a quiet enough night for {0}, but they were wrong. The creeps gather in the morning to find {0} split from head to toe, but oddly the liver was missing..... Pudge has struck again! {1}
You tried to hook {0}'s body for your dinner, but you were fought off by Omniknight's Guardian Angel! No kill for you tonight....
The Eidolons sends {0} to try to convert {1}, boom a stormhammer and {0}'s body comes flying out of the window! {0} is dead....
The Eidolons sends {0} to try to convert {1}, but a hook suddenly comes to {0}'s body. They are flying out of the window, hook and blade brings their body in! WHAT A BASTARD! {0} is dead....
You tried to protect Pudge, but they came out and hooked you! You are dead....
You come to {0}'s house, and start having a little rack. All seems great until {0} pulls out a blade and starts stabbing you, laughing like a maniac! You have died....
don't worry about this string for now! - {0}
Rubick {0} has now become a meepo, just like you!
{0} has died, and you transform into a meepo. Your teammates (if any) are: {1}
Rubick {0} has now become an Enigma, just like you!
{0} has died, and you transform into an Enigma. Your teammates (if any) are: {1}
Rubick {0} has now become a Lycan just like you!
{0} has died, and you transform into Lycan. Your teammates (if any) are: {1}
The only person left standing is the Pudge! They have won!
Who do you want to kill tonight?
With {0}'s dying breath, {1} lost their ability and suddenly died. {1} was {2}
Who do you want to steal?
Who do you want to curse? Choose the first player
Who do you want to curse? Choose the second player
Sven üéØ
Ogre Magi üèπ
Pudge üî™
Rubick üé≠
You were cursed! {0} is your conjoined twins. If they die, you either. If you both make it to the end, you will both win.
You have become Wisp. Your protector is {0}
That was a lovely curse! The Conjoined Twins have won!
In the middle of the lane, everyone finds the body of {0}, thrown by the stormhammer to their body. Looks like they tried to sneak up on Sven! {1}
A hooded figure tried to convert you to their eidolon, but your faith was too strong.
You are already on the wait list for {0}
You have been added to the wait list for {0}. Zeus will PM you when the next game is starting.
A new game is starting in {0}
Morning comes, and the remaining two creeps walk out to the Ancient. {0} takes a look at {1}, gets a big grin on their face, pulls out a hook, and takes {1} out.
Everyone in Azeroth has died.... there's nothing but bodies left. No one wins this round, but Zeus...

As the sun rises, {0} and {1} walk out into the Azeroth's Ancient. {0} pulls out their hook, and hooks {1}. {1} pulls out their blade and threw a stormhammer upon {0}'s face as {0} lands, plunging the hook deep into {1}. Both are dead, Azeroth is empty, there is no winner...
You failed to make a choice, so Zeus has chosen for you: {0}
Won
Lost
Player {0} has been killed for not voting {1} times in the past 24 hours.
Your role is simple - fight with other creeps and try to survive. Each day, you will have a chance to banish the Lycan.

You are Dark Seer. In this role, each night, you may follow a player with your illusion, and have their role revealed to you. Admit to your role wisely: If you reveal you are the dark seer, the lycan will try to kill you!

You get to have fun! Each day, you will attempt to decieve your fellow players. However, each night, you will get to pick a player to kill! Note:if you attack Brewmaster, you yourself will become drunk, and will be unable to attack the next night as you sleep off your hangover! If you attack Wraith King, they will become a Lycan like yourself! Hooray friends!

As the Akasha (Queen of Pain) you will be given the chance to 'rack' another player each night. If they are not lycan, you will be told so (because you live!). If you visit Lycan, you will be killed and racked. If you visit the player the Lycans have chosen to kill, you will be killed as well. However - If you are visiting a player, and the Lycans choose to kill you, you will survive (you weren't home)

You are the Brewmaster! As the drunken master, you are still just a creep. BUT! If the lycans kill you, they will become disabled for the next night, as they are drunk off your closing party last night.
As the cursed Wraith King, you are a normal creep... until Lycan kill you. Once they do, you will become a lycan as well! Free to hunt in the night..... XD
You are a traitorous bastard. If you survive long enough for all the Lycans to die, you will become a Lycan, ready to kill your former teammates in the night!
You are the Omniknight! Each night, you may choose a player to be protected with your Guardian Angel. Be careful however - if you choose to protect a Lycan, there is a 50% chance you will be killed.
You are the unseen Rikimaru.. Each day, you will have the chance to follow another player. Use this carefully however, Lycan always carry Gem of true sight then they will know if you are Rikimaru!
As the Sniper, you are given 2 chances to shoot players with your assasinate. Once you do, everyone will know if you are Sniper! Be careful though, you only have 2 chances!
Techies goal is simple: Get banished. If techies gets banished, he will bomb the Azeroth and wins. Everyone else loses.
Warlock is told that they are dark seer.... when they choose to see someone's role at night, they are told a random role.
As Enigma, your goal is to convert all other players become Eidolon (except wolves). If at the end of the game, all living players are Enigma - the Eidolon wins

Your job is to hunt bounty from Enigma. If enigma tries to convert you, their newest member will die. Each night you may pick a player to 'hunt' - if they are Enigma, they will die and you get bounty from it.
At the beginning of the game, you will choose someone to be your 'protector'. If they die, you'll become a Lycan.
For now, you are a normal creep. However, if dark seer dies, you will become the new dark seer
You will be told who the seer is (the real one, not the fool)
A meepos job is simple - they automatically know who the other meepos are. Otherwise, they are a lowly creep.

Your ancestors had the ability to metamorph into others... while you don't have their full abilities, you can pick a player at the start of the game. If that player dies, you will become what they were. Note: If the player was converted to cult, you will take on their original role. All other normal rules apply: If they were Wild Child and their role model died, you will become a wolf. Otherwise, you will inherit their role model. The cult cannot convert the Doppelg√§nger (but can after the doppelganger switches roles). Also - the Doppelg√§nger can NOT win unless they have transformed. If at the end of the game, the Doppelg√§nger is still the same, they lose (exception: lover)

Love is in the air. As Cupid, you will choose two players at the start of the game. These two players will become madly in love! If one of them dies, the other will die of sorrow :( Note: Lovers will know who each other are, but not be told their roles. If the lovers are the last two alive, they win, regardless of teams. If the lovers are on different teams (villager + wolf), and one team wins (wolf), the lover (villager) wins as well. TL;DR if both lovers are alive at the end, and at least one of them was on the winning team, they both win together

A trigger happy, vindictive player. As the hunter, you try to keep to yourself. However, when others come to visit you, they may find themselves dead, as your paranoia takes hold and you shoot. If the wolves attack you, you have a chance to take one of them with you. Otherwise, if you die, you will get a chance to shoot someone as you die. Note: For wolf attacks, the chance starts at 30%. If there is one wolf, the hunter has a 30% chance to kill the wolf (and survive). For each additional wolf, add 20% (2 wolves = 50%, 3 = 70%, etc). However - if there are multiple wolves, while you may kill one of them, you will still be outnumbered and killed. If the cult tries to convert you, they have a 50% chance to fail. If they fail, you have a 50% chance to kill one of them!

That asylum was silly anyways. What a joke. You are free now however, back to business as usual - killing! The serial killer is a lone player, on their own team. They can win only if they are the last player alive (exception: lovers). As the serial killer, you can kill ANYONE - wolves, hunters, gunners, guardian angels, whatever. If the wolves try to attack you, you will kill one of them (random), and live.
Para is a silly developer that likes to bark at people. Maybe he's been messing with werewolves too long....Messing with werewolves is a very bad idea.
